name: Cult of the Double Headed Snake
name_original: Cult of the Double Headed Snake
description:
My submission for the GMTK2021 Game Jam.

You and your friend joined (a cult) together and got joined (litterally) together! Now you have to escape the cult, and find a way to separate yourselves.

This is one of my first ever games, so constructive criticism is welcome and encouraged.

Hope you like it!

PS: The web build doesn't seem to work for me, so I included a windowows one just in case.
